title: Case-Based Practical Training for Enhancing LX Designer Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional design knowledge and 3+ years of educational development experience in organizational settings
context.additional_context: Real-time collaboration tools optimized for mobile environments, with case analyses reflecting actual industry-specific job postings

learning_goals: Five core competencies can be derived by analyzing job requirements for LX designers across eight industrial sectors.
Learners can compare role differences of LX designers across industries through case studies of actual corporate job postings (JAs).
It is possible to create and incorporate feedback into LX design prototypes executable in mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
